dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3615377K] Domain infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, March 24, 2007 1:15 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3615377K] Domain infringement

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Domain infringement

Message-ID:

Date: Sun, 25 Mar 2007 00:13:18 +0100 
From: Scott <netscott@gmail.com> 
To: abuse@theplanet.com 
Subject: Domain infringement 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit 
Content-Disposition: inline 
Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com
designates 64.233.162.235 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.233.162.235;
envelope-from=netscott@gmail.com; helo=nz-out-0506.google.com; 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 24 Mar 2007 23:13:25.0253 (UTC)
FILETIME=[062CB350:01C76E6A] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Greetings, 
 
I am writing to you folks after discovering that a website hosted by 
your company ( www.mt-2.com  at IP: 69.93.237.86 ) is infringing upon 
my website content and domain melanotan.org 
 
I have zero affiliation with mt-2.com and I am concerned as to why my 
site content and domain name are being duplicated without my 
permission. 
 
I would kindly request that you folks block the mt-2.com website from 
displaying on the web and if need by have your customer contact me. 
 
Looking forward to hearing back from you folks. 
 
Sincerely, 
Scott Stevenson 
Melanotan.org
